title: FS: SGC HOF and Commons PRICE REDUCTION
author: The Nasty Nati

posts.post_title: FS: SGC HOF and Commons PRICE REDUCTION
posts.post_content:
Clark Griffith Batting SGC 45: $110

Bob Ewing SGC 40: $45 SOLD

Art Fromme (PB) SGC A: $40 -- No sign of trimming to my knowledge. Some chipping in lower right corner, but IMO wrongly graded.

Prices include shipping.

The bottom edge of the Fromme looks uneven and sort of curved, like it was trimmed. Or maybe a diamond cut? If I put a ruler on my screen along the bottom of the card, it's even more obvious that it's not straight, but I would have to see it in person to be sure. I'm guessing that's why it got the A.
